TextEng: Who are you? You ain't one of them Luskan soldiers, are you? Luce said to stay away from them 'cause they'd hurt me.
Text: 당신 누구예요? 러스칸 병사는 아니죠? 루체 언니가 그들 가까이 가면 다친대요.

TextEng: When I get to the Moonstone Mask I'll see Luce again! I sure miss her.
Text: 월장석 가면에 가면 루체 언니를 다시 볼 거예요! 정말 보고 싶어요.

TextEng: We made it! We made it! I'm going to be with my sister Luce!
Text: 해냈어요! 해냈어요! 루체 언니랑 같이 있을 거예요!

TextEng: It's warm in here. Out in the streets it was always cold.
Text: 여긴 따뜻해요. 밖 거리는 항상 추웠는데.

TextEng: Eeeek!!
Text: 으악!!

TextEng: *hee-hee* You talk funny. I like you.
Text: *히히* 재밌게 말하네요. 마음에 들어요.

TextEng: *hee-hee* You talk funny. I like you.
Text: *히히* 재밌게 말하네요. 마음에 들어요.

TextEng: *hee-hee* You talk funny. I like you.
Text: *히히* 재밌게 말하네요. 마음에 들어요.

TextEng: Luce is my sister, but I can't get back to her; I'm too scared.
Text: 루체는 제 언니인데, 돌아갈 수가 없어요. 너무 무서워요.

TextEng: I don't know anything. I'm cold. Please, don't hurt me.
Text: 아무것도 몰라요. 추워요. 제발 다치게 하지 마세요.

TextEng: I'm Leesa. I came here with Luce. She's my big sister. She's pretty. There were lots of soldiers out here, so we had to hide.
Text: 전 리사예요. 루체 언니랑 여기 왔어요. 제 큰언니예요. 예뻐요. 밖에 병사들이 많아서 숨어야 했어요.

TextEng: Luce fell asleep 'cause it was dark. I heard a noise and got scared, so I ran away. Then there were monsters.
Text: 어두워서 루체 언니가 잠들었어요. 소리가 들려서 무서워서 도망쳤어요. 그런데 괴물들이 있었어요.

TextEng: I want to go back to the Moonstone Mask. That's where Luce works. I miss her. It's cold out here and I'm scared at night.
Text: 월장석 가면으로 돌아가고 싶어요. 루체 언니가 일하는 곳이에요. 보고 싶어요. 여긴 춥고 밤에 무서워요.

TextEng: I can? Gosh, thanks! You're a real nice <man/woman>. I can't wait to see Luce again!
Text: 그래도 돼요? 와, 고마워요! 정말 좋은 <man/woman>이네요. 루체 언니를 다시 보고 싶어요!

TextEng: Oh. That's okay, <mister/missus>. You look real busy. You got to fight them other soldiers and stuff.
Text: 오. 괜찮아요, <mister/missus>. 정말 바빠 보여요. 다른 병사들이랑 싸워야 하잖아요.

TextEng: If you see Luce tell her to come get me, 'kay?
Text: 루체 언니를 보면 저를 데리러 오라고 말해줘요, 알았죠?

TextEng: I'm not supposed to trust strangers. Luce taught me that.
Text: 낯선 사람을 믿으면 안 돼요. 루체 언니가 가르쳐 줬어요.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> I guess if you know Luce you're not so bad. Okay, I'll go back to the Moonstone Mask!
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 루체 언니를 안다면 나쁜 사람은 아닌가 봐요. 좋아요, 월장석 가면으로 돌아갈게요!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> I better stay here. I'm too scared to leave with all this fighting going on.
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 여기 있는 게 나을 것 같아요. 이렇게 싸움이 많은데 떠나기 너무 무서워요.

TextEng: You're a real nice <man/woman>. I can't wait to see Luce again!
Text: 정말 좋은 <man/woman>이네요. 루체 언니를 다시 보고 싶어요!

TextEng: I hope she ain't mad 'cause I ran off. I was just scared. I didn't mean to get lost.
Text: 도망친 거 화내지 않았으면 좋겠어요. 그냥 무서웠어요. 길을 잃으려던 건 아니었어요.

TextEng: Leesa
Text: 리사

TextEng: Thanks for finding me; it's much warmer here. Out in the streets it was always cold.
Text: 저를 찾아줘서 고마워요. 여긴 훨씬 따뜻해요. 밖 거리는 항상 추웠는데.
